column13: The cottage was the perfect place for us to stay for a weekend getaway. And it was so cute. But the hot tub had too much chlorine, which caused a rash on the both of us.

column13: Had an amazing time with just a couple issues. First the hot tub had WAY too much chlorine, to the point we both ended up with chlorine rashes. Second was the grill ran out of propane while cooking second night. Gated community was extremely nice and we would stay again.
